name: NSViewToolTipOwner
desc: A set of methods for dynamically associating a tool tip with a view.

items.name: func view(NSView, stringForToolTip: NSView.ToolTipTag, point: NSPoint, userData: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?) -> String
items.desc: Returns the tool tip string to be displayed due to the cursor pausing at location point within the tool tip rectangle identified by tag in the view view.
